meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into sixteen leaves or thirty-two pages.
meanings.sent1: I found a tiny sixteenmo book at the library.
meanings.sent2: My favorite novel is a sixteenmo with a beautiful cover.
meanings.sent3: The tiny sixteenmo book looked like a toy in my hands.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were neatly folded into a sixteenmo book.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenmo book fit perfectly in my pocket.

meanings.sent1: She bought a sixteenmo for her collection of small books.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a special section just for sixteenmos.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenmo book was so small, it could easily get lost.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were packed tightly into a sixteenmo volume.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenmo was so compact, it was easy to carry around.
